p: All analyses were carried out in triplicate. Data were expressed as mean Â± SD. Statistical and graphical assessments were performed by utilizing GraphPad Prism 8.0.1 and Microsoft Excel 2010 (Roselle, IL, USA). The t-test was conducted to identify significant differences ( P value < 0.05) between the average values. A correlation study was performed using Pearson's correlation test.
